title: Florian Munteanu
summary: Florian Munteanu (Romanian: [munˈte̯anu]; born 13 October 1990), also known by his ring name Big Nasty, is a German-Romanian actor. He is known for his role of the boxer Viktor Drago in Creed II (2018) and Creed III (2023), and Razor Fist in the superhero film Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (2021).
